thread.title: David London
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by David London

author: David London
title: David London
text: I'm a shameless book addict. I have shelves of books I haven't even opened yet. With Thrift Books, I can find almost anything I'm looking for at prices I honestly can't pass up. My wife is furious, but hey, there's worse addictions to have. You may want to purchase additional book shelves, because is hard to stop buying from Thrift Books.
